Changing the Report Output Path

The application allows you to customize the location in which you store your report files. If desired, when you create a report, you can select an alternative location.

To change the output path used for reports:

  1. Select Tools > Personal Options from the menu bar. The Personal Options dialog opens.

  2. Select the Workspace tab.

  3. Enter or browse for a path for the Report output path text box. This path becomes the default location for all reports that you create using the application.

  4. Click OK.
